title: English for Career Development
headline: Learn the English language for job searching, the interview process and the job application in this free online course.
description: This free online course is designed for non-native English speakers who want to advance their careers. The course will teach you about the application process as well as the job search and interview skills that apply in the United States while comparing and contrasting the same process in your home country. You will also learn about the various ways in which English language networking can help you land your dream job!
courseDescription:
English is one of the most widely spoken languages in the world with more than 1.5 billion English speakers, 360 million of whom use English as a second language. This free online course is designed for non-native English speakers who are interested in advancing their careers in the global marketplace.

In this free online course, English for Career Development, you will learn about the job search, job application and interview process as they apply in the United States, while comparing and contrasting the same processes in your home country. This online course will also give you the opportunity to explore your global career path, while building your vocabulary and improving your language skills to achieve your professional goals. You will learn about the U.S. job application process and strategies for identifying the jobs that match your interests and skills.

Next, you will be learning the steps needed to produce a professional-looking resume and how to write a clear and concise cover letter. Finally, the course focuses on networking skills. This free online course is suitable for non-native English speakers from around the world who are interested in advancing their careers and who want to learn about the job application process in the U.S. Enroll in this online course today and start learning about the job search, application and interview process.
